benchmark_details.name: Flow2Code
benchmark_details.overview: Flow2Code is a benchmark for flowchart-based code generation evaluation, spanning 15 programming languages and including 5,622 code segments paired with 16,866 flowcharts of code, UML, and pseudocode types.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a standardized platform for assessing flowchart-based code generation.

data.source: Constructed from four key datasets: HumanEval-X, MBXP, MCEval, and ClassEval.
data.annotation: Two-step human evaluation for verification and validation.

methodology.calculation: Tasks are successful if any of the top k samples are correct.
methodology.interpretation: Higher Pass@k indicates better code generation performance from flowcharts.
methodology.validation: Data was verified through a two-step human evaluation process.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Ensured compliance with the terms of use of original datasets, protecting intellectual property rights.
